content: sadie scarf crochet pattern by havuna magic © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only materials 2 colors of any weight yarn and a crochet hook to match that yarn i recommend aran weight yarn and a 5mm hook i used garnstudio drops nepal 50g = 75m / 1 8oz = 82yds yarn needle scissors gauge yardage & measurements gauge yardage and your project s measurements depend entirely on the yarn you choose to use with aran weight yarn and 5mm crochet hook gauge 10cmx10cm / 4 x4 = ~16 stitches x 12 row of pattern measurements 220cm/87 7 height x 11cm/4 3 width pattern repeated twice i had three 50g skeins of each color and used a bit more than two skeins of each abbreviations us terminology chain=chain single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet treble_crochet= treble_crochet fp-= front post bp-= back post © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only pattern chain 272 + 2 to turn with color a if you want to make the scarf shorter/longer make sure your stitch count is divisible by 8 and add 2 to turn your stitch count will stay the same the whole project 272 if you follow the pattern the beginning chs don t count as stitches row 1 turn chain 1 half_double_crochet in the 3rd st from the hook half_double_crochet across row 2 turn chain 1 *half_double_crochet double_crochet 3 treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet * repeat between ** across cut color a and change to color b row 3 turn chain 3 *2 fptr fpdc fphdc fpsc fphdc fpdc fptr * repeat between ** across © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only row 4 turn chain 1 *3 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in the back loop of treble_crochet from row 2 and fpsc from row 3 see photos below 4hdc * repeat between ** across row 5 turn chain 3 *treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 2 treble_crochet * repeat between ** across cut color b and change to color a row 6 turn chain 1 *bpsc bphdc bpdc 3 bptr bpdc bphdc * repeat between ** across © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only row 7 turn chain 1 *7 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in the back loop of treble_crochet from row 5 and bpsc from row 6 see photos below * repeat between ** across from the other side repeat row 2-7 one more time or as many times as you want cut yarn fasten_off weave in ends thank you <3 contact me havunamagic@gmail com instagram havunamagic © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only
